choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction: How do you align a row of divs to the right using flex in css?  Show me an example.

### Response:

To achieve this, we can use CSS Flex properties such as "flex-direction" set to "row", and then add a negative margin on the left side of each div element. Here's how it would look like in practice:
```css
/* This is just an example style sheet */
html { overflow: auto; }, body { width : 1024px; height: 768px; background-color: rgb(239, 255, 14); margin: 0 auto; overflow: hidden; } /* Demo Styles Here */ .flex-example{ display: flex; justify-content: space-between;} .flex-example div { width : calc((100vw)/3)); height: 768px; background-color: rgb(255, 249, 14); margin:-1px 0 0 -1px; } /* Demo Styles Here */ .flex-example div { width : calc((100vw)/3)); height: 768px; background-color: rgb(255, 249, 14); margin:-1px 0 0 -1px;
